CustomField.description: Controls the data format, and the way the setting will appear in the editor. All types except TextArea store values in the SettingValue__c field. Settings of type TextArea store data in the SettingTextAreaValue__c field
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Controls the data format, and control used to display/edit the setting's value. Valid Setting Types are:
String - Single line TextArea - Multiline Integer Checkbox - Boolean Picklist URL
Page Method
CustomField.label: Setting Type
